name: A Greener Source
description: Zero-cost office furniture donations including desks, chairs, filing cabinets, and other office furnishings; request furniture through website; schedule pickup or delivery
fullDescription: A Greener Source is a nonprofit that diverts office furniture from landfills by donating it to other nonprofits, helping organizations furnish their spaces sustainably and at no cost.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free office desks and workstations
- Chairs (office, conference, guest)
- Filing cabinets and storage
- Conference tables
- Cubicle systems and panels
- Other office furnishings as available
howToGetIt:
1. Visit agreenersource.com and create an account
2. Register your nonprofit organization
3. Browse available furniture inventory online
4. Request items through the website
5. Schedule pickup or arrange delivery (fees may apply for delivery)
